entities.description: A code that identifies a specific drug within the dataset.
The chemical name or common name used to identify a drug.
The specific definition or description associated with a drug code.
Drugs that have similar nomenclature or spelling, which may cause confusion.

relationships.description: Links the drug code to its specific definition or description.
Indicates drugs that have a similar name or spelling, potentially causing confusion in identification.
Associates the drug name with its detailed code level definition.
